[h1]Half-Life 2: Lost Coast[/h1]

[b]Bom, Basicamente √© uma fase que foi cortada de Half life 2.[/b]

[b]Pelo o que eu entendi Gordon Freeman em algum momento de sua aventura, foi parar em Lost Coast que se passa na cidade de Santa Olga.[/b]

[b]Seu papel √© derrubar a torre Combine que est√° atacando a cidade.[/b]

[b]Mas, depois come√ßamos a compreender que o motivo desse cap√≠tulo foi para mostrar as novas implementa√ß√µes e atualiza√ß√µes da qualidade da ilumina√ß√£o e f√≠sica do jogo.[/b]

[b]Est√° fase demostra a nova tecnologia Source Engine, que estava sendo lan√ßada na √©poca [/b]

[b]Apesar de ter uma fase s√≥, e ser bem curtinha.[/b]

[b]Apresenta muito bem os novos gr√°ficos que estavam por vir.[/b]

[b]Vale a pena dar uma olhadinha, existe um sistema de coment√°rios dos desenvolvedores, eles come√ßam a dar uma introdu√ß√£o sobre essa tecnologia e como foi o processo para melhorar o ambiente gr√°fico.[/b]

[b]Para poder entender os coment√°rios, sugiro dar uma olhadinha neste guia.[/b]

Puntos a favor:
-El mapa esta echo exelente y se siente realmente terminado y detallado.

Puntos en contra:
-solo hay un personaje con el que podemos interactuar realmente.
-el mapeado es muy extra√±o, esto lo digo por que hay puntos en donde sientes que te caes pero no lo haces (especialmente en la colina)
-la historia es muy floja y no tiene mucha coerencia que Freeman este ahi en plena nada (lo cual hace pensar que este episodio iba a estar despues de "CARRETERA 17")
-La duracion es muy poca como para considerarse un episodio en concreto.
-la optimizacion es horrible a comparacion del half life 2

Fuera de eso es una buena inclucion para half life 2, pero creo que deberian estar gratis y accesible para todos en steam, como una demo o algo por ese estilo, y creo que no deberia averse desechado en primer lugar y simplemente adaptarlo un poco.
De cualquier modo me gusto bastante y me entretuvo un ratiiiiiiito.

If you‚Äôre bored and want to see the bonus content go ahead.

I thought this game module was really fun.  After battling it out with the Marines in Black Mesa (and later, Black Mesa Definitive), the Combine seem [i]freakier[/i] than I remember.  They seem to come out of nowhere, and even when you think you've got a corner covered, they seem to appear right behind you!

I'm planning to run through HL2 again, once I complete Xen - but if you're craving some classic HL2 action, and especially in a lightweight and resource-friendly package, look no further.  It took me about 30 mins to complete, and that was in my play style which is very cautious around corners - Black Ops style.

Hint: Don't be stingy with the rocket launcher.  Especially when you get to the 'machine...'  You'll thank me.  ;-)

[Note: I don't remember if I got this for free, but I'm not a professional reviewer, so I didn't check anything.  If I did have to pay for it today, I'd spend about $5-7, if for no other reason than to get the creator-commentary.]
It's pretty cool for a tech demo
If you like Half-Life 2, you should play Lost Coast. It's short and sweet, and it is interesting to hear the commentary if you're into that.
the coast wasn`t lost. it was right infront of me
Me parecio un poco extra√±o el juego, en fin, lo recomiendo si te gustan los juegos de HL
Great, an overall very nice tech demo for both showcasing what's to come and the power of source (at the time atleast)

It took me close to 3 hours to finish it, but that's just the way I play games.  I go slow and check everything.  The commentary states, among other things, this was intended as a level in Half-Life 2 but was dropped.  The level is unfinished as you can walk through the silos and many of the buildings outside the main house.  There's even an area where trees and houses are hanging in space,  lol obviously unfinished, but I still recommend it!

No se trata de un juego, en realidad es una fase demostraci√≥n que se hizo para mostrar el nuevo motor source con el que se estaba desarrollando el Half life 2 (primer juego que no se vendia como tal, sino que te vend√≠an una clave de steam).

El nivel, bastante cortito no se incluy√≥ en el juego pero est√° repleto de notas de los desarrolladores que te explican y promocionan los efectos visuales novedosos de source. Es m√°s que una curiosidad, es una curiosidad interactiva.

Es muy aconsejable jugarlo y leerle, aunque est√© un poco desfasado, no te lleva tiempo y es un trocito de historia de los juegos de ordenador y de steam.

Half-Life 2: Lost Coast review
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Pros:
+FPS
+Neither the sequel nor the prequel
+Shows how hard Valve works
+Improved graphics from Half-Life 2 (Just a little better)
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Cons:
-Very short game (about 15 minutes)
-------------------------------------------------- --------------------
Do I recommend Half-Life 2: Lost Coast?
Yes

A pretty good example of what the Source Engine is capable of and how it affects gameplay. Perfect for a Source Engine or Half Life fan. Commentary Nodes allow you too hear the developers talk about how the game looks the way it does. 

10/10

A nice example of a Half Life level that teaches what the developers do to each level

Really more of a tech demo for some old tech you don't care about.  Still, a fun little map that despite being very short, has some good fun, and some lovely scenery.  Maybe it's more interesting with the commentary; I don't care about commentary.

cool to see old valve tests and how it still holds up in 2021

Lost Coast es para detenerte unos minutos y apreciar la vista, las f√≠sicas, los detalles de la piel humana y por sobre todo la nueva tecnolog√≠a del alto rango din√°mico, que marc√≥ un antes y un despu√©s en todos los juegos.
 Te recomiendo jugarlo activando los comentarios de los desarrolladores, ellos explican un poco de esta nueva tecnolog√≠a y de la experiencia que buscaban ofrecer en ese entonces a los jugadores.
 El arduo trabajo sobre el agua, la iluminaci√≥n y los rayos solares  deja un resultado exquisito.
 En fin, si te interesa saber #ComoSeTrabaj√≥ , #ComoSeHizo y quieres opinar, jugadlo.
Mas que un juego es un demo, historia por lo tanto no tiene, bugs graficos(agua y techos), la iluminaci√≥n mola, y muy corto.
it's half life 2 but lost coast
